name: Sunflower Labs
description: Sunflower Labs developed the world’s first fully autonomous, AI-powered drone security system. Its Beehive platform—combining a self-charging drone, smart base station and cloud intelligence—delivers scalable, real-time protection for commercial, industrial and residential properties. Sunflower is deployed globally with partners including Alarm.com, Alert360, Securion, 10 Federal Companies, Swiss Federal Railways and many more.
